taxonomicnotes: The species been recorded from the Kapuas River, western Kalimantan, Indonesia by Roberts (1989), however this was later described as A. robertsi.
rationale: The species has a wide distribution in the Chao Phraya and Lower Mekong basins. Although information is required on threats, it is considered Least Concern at present.
evaluator: Kottelat, M., Vidthayanon, C. & Smith, K.
